verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-acho the chief Musician עַֽל־ <WH5921> [T'al-above הַגִּתִּ֗ית <WH1665> hag-git-Tit, upon Gittith מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> miz-Mor A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <WH1732> le-da-Vid. of David יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD אֲדֹנֵ֗ינוּ <WH113> 'a-do-Nei-nu, our Lord מָֽה־ <WH4100> mah- How אַדִּ֣יר <WH117> 'ad-Dir how excellent שִׁ֭מְךָ <WH8034> me-cha [is] thy name בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz; in all the earth אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher Who תְּנָ֥ה <WH5414> te-Nah who hast set ה֝וֹדְךָ֗ <WH1935> hod-cha, thy glory עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- above הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> hash-sha-Ma-yim. above the heavens

מִפִּ֤י <WH6310> mip-Pi Out of the mouth עֽוֹלְלִ֨ים׀ <WH5768> 'ol-Lim of babes וְֽיֹנְקִים֮ <WH3243> ve-yo-ne-Kim and sucklings יִסַּ֪דְתָּ֫ <WH3245> yis-Sad-ta hast thou ordained עֹ֥ז <WH5797> 'oz strength לְמַ֥עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an Because צוֹרְרֶ֑יךָ <WH6887> tzor-Rei-cha; because of thine enemies לְהַשְׁבִּ֥ית <WH7673> le-hash-Bit that thou mightest still א֝וֹיֵ֗ב <WH341> o-Yev, the enemy וּמִתְנַקֵּֽם׃ <WH5358> u-mit-nak-Kem. and the avenger

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- When אֶרְאֶ֣ה <WH7200> 'er-'Eh When I consider שָׁ֭מֶיךָ <WH8064> mei-cha thy heavens מַעֲשֵׂ֣י <WH4639> ma-'a-Sei the work אֶצְבְּעֹתֶ֑יךָ <WH676> 'etz-be-'o-Tei-cha; of thy fingers יָרֵ֥חַ <WH3394> ya-Re-ach the moon וְ֝כוֹכָבִ֗ים <WH3556> ve-cho-cha-Vim, and the stars אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which כּוֹנָֽנְתָּה׃ <WH3559> ko-Na-ne-tah. which thou hast ordained

מָֽה־ <WH4100> mah- What אֱנ֥וֹשׁ <WH582> e-Noosh What is man כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- that תִזְכְּרֶ֑נּוּ <WH2142> tiz-ke-Ren-nu; that thou art mindful וּבֶן־ <WH1121> u-ven- of him;and the son אָ֝דָ֗ם <WH120> 'a-Dam, of man כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki that תִפְקְדֶֽנּוּ׃ <WH6485> tif-ke-Den-nu. that thou visitest

וַתְּחַסְּרֵ֣הוּ <WH2637> vat-te-chas-se-Re-hu lower מְּ֭עַט <WH4592> Me-'at For thou hast made him a little מֵאֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> me-'E-lo-Him; than the angels וְכָב֖וֹד <WH3519> ve-cha-Vod him with glory וְהָדָ֣ר <WH1926> ve-ha-Dar and honour תְּעַטְּרֵֽהוּ׃ <WH5849> te-'at-te-Re-hu. and hast crowned

תַּ֭מְשִׁילֵהוּ <WH4910> Tam-shi-le-hu Thou madest him to have dominion בְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣י <WH4639> be-ma-'a-Sei over the works יָדֶ֑יךָ <WH3027> ya-Dei-cha; of thy hands כֹּ֝ל <WH3605> kol all שַׁ֣תָּה <WH7896> Shat-tah thou hast put תַֽחַת־ <WH8478> ta-chat- under רַגְלָֽיו׃ <WH7272> rag-Lav. all [things] under his feet

צֹנֶ֣ה <WH6792> tzo-Neh All sheep וַאֲלָפִ֣ים <WH504> va-'a-la-Fim and oxen כֻּלָּ֑ם <WH3605> kul-Lam; All וְ֝גַ֗ם <WH1571> ve-Gam, and also בַּהֲמ֥וֹת <WH929> ba-ha-Mot yea and the beasts שָׂדָֽי׃ <WH7704> sa-Dai. of the field

צִפּ֣וֹר <WH6833> tzip-Por The fowl שָׁ֭מַיִם <WH8064> ma-yim of the air וּדְגֵ֣י <WH1709> u-de-Gei and the fish הַיָּ֑ם <WH3220> hai-Yam; of the sea עֹ֝בֵ֗ר <WH5674> 'o-Ver, [and whatsoever] passeth through אָרְח֥וֹת <WH734> a-re-Chot the paths יַמִּֽים׃ <WH3220> yam-Mim. of the seas

יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh O LORD אֲדֹנֵ֑ינוּ <WH113> 'a-do-Nei-nu; our Lord מָֽה־ <WH4100> mah- How אַדִּ֥יר <WH117> 'ad-Dir how excellent שִׁ֝מְךָ֗ <WH8034> me-Cha, [is] thy name בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. in all the earth
